task: Parse an AWS CloudWatch log entry and extract the timestamp, log level, and message. The log format is: '[TIMESTAMP] [LOG_LEVEL] Message content here'
solution_criteria: The regex should correctly capture three groups: timestamp, log level, and message. It should handle various timestamp formats and log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR)

task: Write a Python function that takes an AWS S3 bucket name and returns True if the bucket name follows AWS naming conventions (lowercase, 3-63 characters, no consecutive hyphens)
solution_criteria: Function should validate bucket name length (3-63 chars), contain only lowercase letters/numbers/hyphens, not start/end with hyphen, and not have consecutive hyphens. Should return boolean.

task: Generate a JSON policy document for an AWS IAM role that allows read-only access to a specific S3 bucket named 'my-data-bucket'
solution_criteria: JSON should be valid IAM policy syntax with proper Version, Statement array, Effect set to Allow, Action limited to s3:GetObject and s3:ListBucket, and Resource restricted to the specific bucket
